participant_1.background:
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i used to work as an actress.
i also dance and sing.
my favorite food is sushi.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.background:
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
I'm trying to get my mother to love me.
i have always wanted a pot bellied pig.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.

content.text: I'm doing ok. I'm kind of bored, actually. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to film documentaries, play piano, and design and sew clothes.
That's really cool! I used to be an actress.
Oh, that must have been fun! I've always wanted to act, but I'm too shy.
I know what you mean. It's definitely a nerve-wracking experience.
Yeah, I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about acting?
I loved getting to be someone else for a while. It was like a vacation from my own life.
That makes sense. I've always thought it would be fun to play a character that's completely different from me.
It is! It's a great way to explore different parts of yourself.
I'm glad you enjoyed it. I hope you get to do it again someday.
